plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is drama, their favourite kind of plot is complex and multi-layered, their favourite kind of musical score is atmospheric and enhances the mood of the movie, their favourite mood for the musical score is dark and foreboding, their favourite setting is urban and contemporary, their favourite visual style is realistic and gritty, their favourite writing style is character-driven and nuanced, their favourite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favourite themes are crime, psychology, and social commentary.
